CARDINAL . On DATE a public demonstration entitled the “ DATE of CARDINAL ” was held in central GPE to protest against the allegedly rigged presidential elections . CARDINAL . On an unidentified date Police Officer PERSON , the alleged victim of the applicant ’s assault , was examined as a witness . He had fallen to the ground ; someone had hit him several times and had taken off his anti - riot helmet . Other police officers had picked him up to take away him from the crowd . “ TIME on DATE ... at FAC ... unidentified persons ... called those present [ at the venue ] to move outside the agreed meeting venue , to defy the lawful orders of the police ... , to use violence ... which led to mass disorder accompanied by the use of violence against public officials in connection with the performance of their duties [ and ] the destruction of property .
